successes.title: EMBRACE+, a smart piece of wearable technology
successes.description: The EMBRACE+ keeps you informed, while your smartphone stays in your pocket or purse!

Pledges.description: Thanks for sharing our excitement! Your name will be added to our website. So please spread the word on Facebook and Twitter to help us achieve our goal!
Regular Edition - You'll receive One EMBRACE+ and a charging cable shipped in fancy packaging. The app for Android and iPhone can be downloaded for free in iTunes and the Google Play Store
Limited Edition - You'll receive One EMBRACE+ and a charging cable, plus a hand-screen print with 'Backer 1/500' and a satin pouch with LTD embroidery shipped in the luxurious LTD packaging

Special Edition - You'll receive One EMBRACE+ and a charging cable, plus an exclusive hand-screen print with your message of choice, a satin pouch with SE embroidery and personal written thankyou word from Paul and Rudi, shipped in the beautiful SE packaging
